items.title: 'I've not come to play around' - Wardley ready for Parker
items.summary: Britain's Fabio Wardley says he is committed to "big fights only" as he and Joseph Parker speak before their heavyweight fight in London on 25 October, with the winner expected to be Oleksandr Usyk's next opponent.

items.title: North on 'horrible weight' of concussion debate
items.summary: In a wide-ranging interview with BBC Sport, George North talks about being the "poster boy" for the concussion debate and the "tough rebuild" facing Wales.

items.title: North on 'horrible weight' of concussion debate
items.summary: In a wide-ranging interview with BBC Sport, George North talks about being the "poster boy" for the concussion debate and the "tough rebuild" facing Wales.

items.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE teardown video reveals improved repairability
items.summary: Last week Samsung announced the Galaxy S25 FE, a refined version of the S24 FE from last year. Among the upgrades are the full Exynos 2400 chipset paired with a 10% larger vapor chamber and a larger 4,900mAh battery with 45W charging (up from 4,700mAh and 25W on the 2024 phone). In a teardown videoâ€¦

items.title: North on concussions, pressure and Welsh rugby's future
items.summary: Speaking to BBC sports editor Dan Roan, former Wales centre George North explains the pressure he was under after suffering concussions, and addresses the future of Welsh rugby.

items.title: Samsung 9100 Pro 8TB SSD review: Bigger, badder, and better
items.summary: Samsung pushes the limit with the 8TB 9100 Pro, offering the first large-capacity high-end PCIe 5.0 drive. Itâ€™s a good drive, but the price might cause some hesitation.

items.title: Apple announces Final Cut Camera 2.0 with ProRes RAW, genlock support
items.summary: Apple has announced a new version of the Final Cut Camera app for iOS, bringing features designed specifically for the newly launched iPhone 17 Pro and 17 Pro Max. With Final Cut Camera 2.0, users on the iPhone 17 Pro series gain support for ProRes RAW and genlock, while the entire iPhone 17 lineupâ€¦

items.title: Sacked referee Coote accused of making indecent image of child
items.summary: The former Premier League referee is due in court in Nottingham on Thursday.

items.title: Lucky bidder scoops $8,000 PC for $23 at auction â€” Mislabelled Fractal Design case listing had 24-core Threadripper 3960X, 256GB of memory, and an RTX 3080 Ti inside
items.summary: A lucky online auction bidder has scored an $8,000 PC for just $23, bidding on a mislabelled Fractal Design case that actually had a full system inside.

items.title: Fulham and Wolves wronged by VAR - panel
items.summary: The video assistant referee made two mistakes in the most recent round of Premier League fixtures, says the Key Match Incidents panel.

items.title: Hewitt gets two-week ban for pushing doping official
items.summary: Australia's Davis Cup captain Lleyton Hewitt gets a two-week ban and fine after being found guilty of pushing a doping control official.

items.title: 'It's good to make history' - Spence on England debut
items.summary: Tottenham defender Djed Spence hopes to inspire "young kids around the world" after he won his first England cap in their 5-0 win against Serbia, becoming the first Muslim to play for the senior men's team.

items.title: Marmoush to miss Manchester derby with knee injury
items.summary: Manchester City will be without forward Omar Marmoush for Sunday's Manchester derby after the Egyptian suffers a knee injury on international duty.

items.title: Halot X-1 review: A solid step forward for serious hobbyists
items.summary: Halot's X-1 offers great prints, smart features, and a few growing pains.

The Realme P3 Lite will be powered by the Dimensity 6300 SoC, boot Realme UI 6, and have 6GB RAM and 128GB storage onboard. The smartphone will pacâ€¦

items.title: Nvidiaâ€™s latest RTX Remix update brings path-traced particles to classic games â€” major overhaul promises 'tens of thousands' of particles without significant performance reduction
items.summary: Nvidiaâ€™s modding platform for retrofitting classic games with ray tracing has just had a huge overhaul, with updates including an "advanced path-traced particle system."

items.title: Slot an 8TB WD Black SN850X into your PC now that it's at one of its lowest-ever prices of $539 â€” Install all your favorite games on one drive
items.summary: Pop a massive 8TB drive into your PC and not worry about storage space on your M.2 SSD. The SN850X 8TB is now only $539.

items.title: Nvidia claims software and hardware upgrades allow Blackwell Ultra GB300 to dominate MLPerf benchmarks â€” touts 45% DeepSeek R-1 inference throughput increase over GB200
items.summary: Nvidia is claiming the top spot in GPU performance in a range of AI benchmarks for open-source models, claiming its new Blackwell Ultra GB300 platform is the best choice for data centers seeking to maximize profitability for AI inference in the future.

items.title: Canada game shows 'gulf' as Wales youngsters exposed
items.summary: After four players made their senior debuts for Wales during the recent international break, pundits, players and head coach Craig Bellamy give their assessment on the efforts of the nation's newest caps.

items.title: How can Martinelli find his form for Arsenal to silence critics?
items.summary: Things have not been clicking for the Gabriel Martinelli at Arsenal recently. BBC Sport looks at the issues and how the Brazilian winger could regain his form.

items.title: Watford to wear one-off Elton John-inspired kit
items.summary: The shirt celebrates the club's long-term relationship with the music icon.

items.title: How to make graphical Python apps the EasyGUI way
